markdownRemark.html: The Choir and Orchestra Collegium Musicum Costa del Sol is a non-profit-making music society of amateur and professional singers and musicians. They welcome new members at any time and their aim is to further knowledge and promote interest in classical music amongst their members as well as to a wider audience on the Costa del Sol. They have their main concerts at Christmas and towards the end of May.

frontmatter.title: Collegium Musicum
